info.title: WebKitBrowser API
info.description: The `WebKitBrowser` plugin provides web browsing functionality based on the WebKit engine.

fps.summary: Current number of frames-per-second the browser is rendering

headers.summary: Headers to send on all requests that the browser makes
headers.description:
Use this property to send on all requests that the browser makes.
 
### Events 

 No Events.

httpcookieacceptpolicy.description:
Use this property to accept HTTP cookie policy.
 
### Events 

 No Events.

languages.description:
Use this property to return User preferred languages.
 
### Events 

 No Events.

localstorageenabled.description:
Use this property to return Local storage availability.
 
### Events 

 No Events.

state.description:
Use this property to return the running state of the service.
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `statechange`| Triggered if the state of the service changes.|

url.description:
Use this property to load URL in the browser.
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `urlchange`| Triggered if the URL changes in the browser | 
 |`loadfinished`| Triggered if the `urlchange` event returns `true` as URL loaded successfully |
 |`loadfailed`| Triggered if the `urlchange` event returns `false` as URL failed to load |

useragent.description:
Use this property to return `UserAgent` string used by the browser.
 
### Events 

 No Events.

params.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; x86_64 GNU/Linux) AppleWebKit/601.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/8.0 Safari/601.1 WP

visibility.description:
Use this property to return visibilty status of current browser.
 
### Events 
| Event | Description | 
| :----------- | :----------- |
| `visibilitychange`| Triggered if the browser visibility changes.|

errors.description: Returned when the operation is unavailable

bridgeevent.summary:
Sends a legacy `$badger` event.
 
### Events 

 No Events.

params.summary: A base64 encoded JSON string response to be delivered to the `window.$badger.event(handlerId, json)` method

bridgereply.summary:
A response for legacy `$badger`.
 
### Events 

 No Events.

params.summary: A base64 encoded JSON string response to be delivered to the `$badger.callback(pid, success, json)` method

delete.summary:
Removes the contents of a directory recursively from the persistent storage.
 
### Events 

 No Events.

path.description: Path to directory (within the persistent storage) from which to delete contents

bridgequery.summary: A Base64 encoded JSON message from legacy `$badger` bridge

loadfailed.summary: Triggered when the browser fails to load a page

loadfinished.summary: Triggered when the initial HTML document has been completely loaded and parsed

httpstatus.summary: The response code of main resource request

pageclosure.summary: Triggered when the web page requests to close its window

statechange.summary: Triggered when the state of the service changes

suspended.summary: `true` if the service has entered a suspended state  or `false` if the service has entered a resumed state

urlchange.summary: Triggered when the URL changes in the browser

loaded.summary: `true` if the URL has been loaded or `false` if the URL change has been requested

visibilitychange.summary: Triggered when the browser visibility changes

hidden.summary: `true` if the browser has been hidden or `false` if the browser is made visible
